title: Homemade corn chowder
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons salted butter', '1 medium red onion, finely chopped', '2 sticks celery, sliced', '2 cloves garlic, mined', '2 medium potaotes, peeled and diced', '4 rashers bacon, chopped', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '600ml full fat milk', '1 bay leaf', '150ml chicken stock', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 tins sweetcorn, drained', 'chopped fresh parsley, to taste']
